item.title: Suspect in Graceland fraud pleads guilty in connection with scheme
item.description: As part of a plea deal, prosecutors agreed to dismiss one count of aggravated identity theft that was previously filed against her.

item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: DOGE emails asked federal judges to explain their work
item.description: White House employees are exempt from replying to Elon Musk's email asking federal workers to detail their accomplishments.

item.title: WATCH: South African students create stunning crowd formations
item.description: Students at Curro Durbanville High School create synchronized formations while chanting to songs like “Can’t Stop the Feeling” by Justin Timberlake an...

item.title: WATCH: Top vehicle picks of 2025 revealed
item.description: ABC News chief transportation correspondent Gio Benitez exclusively announces the highest-rated Consumer Reports car picks and top scores.

item.title: US consumer confidence plummets in February, biggest monthly decline since 2021
item.description: U.S. consumer confidence plummeted in February, the biggest monthly decline in more than four years, a business research group said Tuesday
